content: हंहो {%<ab>ind.</ab>%} {@--1@} A vocative particle corresponding to, ‘ho,’ ‘hallo’; हंहो चिन्मयचित्तचंद्रमणयः संवर्धयध्वं रसान् <ls>Chandr. 1. 2.</ls> {@--2@} A particle expressing haughtiness or contempt. {@--3@} A particle of interrogation. (In dramas it is mostly used as a form of address by characters of the middling class; हंहो बाह्मण मा कुष्य <ls>Mu. 1</ls>).
